```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(flexdashboard)
library(p8105.datasets)

data("instacart")

data("ny_noaa")

data("nyc_airbnb")
```

Plotly scatterplot

```{r}
instacart |> 
  count(department) |> 
  mutate(department = fct_reorder(department, n)) |> 
  plot_ly(
  x = ~department, 
  y = ~n,
  color = ~department,
  type = "bar", 
  colors = "viridis",
  alpha = 0.5
)

```

Plotly boxplot

```{r}
instacart_small <- instacart |> 
  sample_n(100000)
 
instacart |>
  group_by(department, order_hour_of_day) |>
  summarise(n_orders = n(), .groups = "drop") |>
  plot_ly(
    x = ~order_hour_of_day,
    y = ~n_orders,
    color = ~department,
    type = "scatter",
    mode = "lines"
  )
```
